description: This is a header in a drop down selector, to filter a search by the submission date
This is a heading in a drop down selector, to filter a search by date updated
This is a heading in a drop down selector, to filter a search by a report published date
This is a heading in a drop down selector, to filter a search by request created dates
This is a label in a drop down selector, and will appear a sentence format like "Report published less than 3 days ago"
This is a label in a drop down selector, and will appear a sentence format like "Report published less than 3 weeks ago".
This is a label in a drop down selector, and will appear a sentence format like "Report published less than 3 months ago".
This is a label in a drop down selector, and will appear a sentence format like "Report published less than 3 years ago".

This is a label in a drop down selector, to filter a search by dates. The user selects a range of dates including a start and end date. In English this would be the first part of a phrase like "Report published between February 3, 2022 and February 9, 2022".

This is a label in a drop down selector, to filter a search by dates. The dates are relative to the current day and in English this would be the first part of a phrase like "Report published less than 10 months ago".

This is a label in a drop down selector, to filter a search by dates. The dates are relative to the current day and in English this would be the first part of a phrase like "Report published more than 10 months ago".
Tooltip to tell the user they can add remove the start date portion of this filter
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to abort an in-progress operation
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to confirm an action
String displayed between after and before date pickers
Tooltip to tell the user they can add remove the end date portion of this filter
Placeholder text to tell the user to enter a number
